Release notes

Common

What's fixed

  • Source code build, using Custom, fails to load all dependencies (#7411)

CSP Improvements

CSP errors in Grid when columns are initially hidden

CSP errors in Grid when sticky columns are enabled

Apply styles programmatically instead of inline for CSP compatibility

Remove inline styles in Gantt to make it CSP compatible

CSP errors in Scheduler

CSP errors in MultiColumnComboBox when width is set for a column

CSP errors in Grid due to inline styles in templates

Features and Updates

Breadcrumb

What's new

  • Add sizing to Breadcrumb

Chart

What's new

  • Pyramid Chart Type

Editor

What's fixed

  • Loading icon does not hide after deleting the last image in the Editor's ImageBrowser (#7182)

Grid

What's new

  • Grid ContextMenu

What's fixed

  • Missing span with class="k-button-text" wrapping page numbers (#7480)
  • JS error thrown by setting Grid column draggable true without setting reorderable.rows true (#7452)
  • Filter and columns popups appear together in Grid's classic columnMenu (#7441)
  • Unexpeced change event fired on clicking a Grid's custom icon button command (#7437)
  • ForeignKey column value is not sanitized if raw HTML is inserted (#7436)
  • Grid's FilterMenu does not show records for second criterion DropDownList when bound to a complex object (#7393)
  • Not working Grid pdf.repeatHeaders option (#7386)
  • Navigatable Grid with Row filter mode and detailTemplate does not execute filter (#7384)
  • Kendo grid menu filter dropdown does not populate possible values for second/extra condition (#7249)
  • Grid with Group paging cannot be filtered through the default search panel (#7223)
  • The titles are not exported to Excel with exportSelectedToExcel method in Grid (#7203)

MultiColumnComboBox

What's fixed

  • MultiColumnComboBox does not display all items after selection (#7413)

Pager

What's new

  • Update responsiveness in pager

What's fixed

  • Missing span with class="k-button-text" wrapping page numbers (#7480)

Scheduler

What's fixed

  • Improve the performance of the slotByElement method in Scheduler (#7380)

TreeList

What's fixed

  • Grid's FilterMenu does not show records for second criterion DropDownList when bound to a complex object (#7393)
  • Kendo grid menu filter dropdown does not populate possible values for second/extra condition (#7249)

Upload

What's fixed

  • Upload file icon is missing when you select multiple files with batch:true (#7426)
